name: search-router
title: Search Router
description: Local-first search with DuckDuckGo !Bangs (similar to unduck.link)
author: franzwilhelm

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search the Web
commands.subtitle: Search the Web using DuckDuckGo Bangs
commands.description: Search the Web using any of the available search engines. Powered by DuckDuckGo Bangs

commands.name: browse-search-engines
commands.title: Browse Search Engines
commands.subtitle: Browse and select your default search engine
commands.description: View all available search engines and set your default search engine to use with the search command.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
